column4: I am trying to figure out why play/pause forward etc. buttons aren't responding for me when watching videos on sites. For example youtube, also other sites with video load but will not play video. I'm thinking its goto do with adobe. Can any one point me into the right direction please?
It's a flash bug. Nothing much you can do about it
other than use spacebar to play/pause video and arrow keys to fast forward/rewind
If you click on the flash video to give it focus, you can usually use keyboard shortcuts
